actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."User" SET
    "id" = '',
    "name" = '',
    "mobileNumber" = '',
    "password" = '',
    "address" = '',
    "city" = '',
    "state" = '',
    "country" = '',
    "pincode" = '',
    "referredById" = '',
    "referralCode" = '',
    "updatedAt" = TIMESTAMP '2019-07-01 10:00:00',
    "bankDetails" = '{}'::json,
    "aadharCard" = ''
  WHERE 1 = 0; -- Specify a valid condition here. Removing the condition may update every row in the table!
